title: Periamma Ê¼epidemion, or, Vulgar errours in practice censured also The art of oratory, composed for the benefit of young students.
author: Walker, Obadiah, 1616-1699.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntinton Library.
Each part has special t.p. and separate paging.
"Vulgar errours ..." has been attributed to Ralph Battell. cf. Halkett & Laing.
Wing attributes the entire work to 0. Walker.
Clark Library and the Stationers' Reigster for 28 May 1659 attributes work to Thomas Jenison.
